0: Prosecutors have dropped a statutory rape charge against a teenager who dated a 15-year-old Massachusetts girl who later was bullied and committed suicide. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Austin Renaud was arrested at the same time as five South Hadley classmates charged in the bullying of Phoebe Prince. He was the only one not charged with bullying Prince, who hanged herself in January 2010. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The five teens acknowledged that they participated in bullying Prince and were sentenced to probation during court hearings Wednesday and Thursday. Prosecutors agreed to drop the most serious charges against them. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR District Attorney David Sullivan
